label: specifiedHandlingInstructions
comment: Handling instructions specified for this logistics means of transport.
Handling instructions specified for this logistics transport movement.

rangeIncludes.comment: Handling information of an instructive nature.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a header level.

The devices used to convey goods or other objects from place to place during logistics cargo movements.
